entry.title: Wednesday: Showers. High 8.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Showers beginning near noon. Amount 5 to 10 mm. Wind south 40 km/h gusting to 60. High 8. UV index 6 or high. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CDT Wednesday 26 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Showers. Low minus 1.
